column3: News;A black man foreigner stripped off his pants and wandered half naked on the streets.------The unusual incident took place at 6:00 am on November 12
column6: corner of Samdech Chea Sim Street
column7: Sen Sok District.------The  man has not been identified
column9: the mna had been driving a car to to the top of Samdech Chea Sim Road .------The car pulled over and the semi-naked man began to walk away. He was detained by the local police for questioning.------*Later reports from other outlets suggest the man might have been high on drugs.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/271321------ ------
